tool_description: Creates personalized notification content and formatting for prayer reminders based on user preferences and spiritual context.

prayer_name.description: Name of the upcoming prayer or meditation

message_tone.description: Tone of the reminder: gentle, encouraging, urgent, peaceful, formal

spiritual_tradition.description: User's spiritual tradition for appropriate language

error_messages: Invalid minutes_until: Must be between 1 and 120 minutes
Invalid message tone: Use one of [gentle, encouraging, urgent, peaceful, formal]
Empty prayer name: Prayer name cannot be empty
User name too long: User name must be under 30 characters
usage: Provide prayer name, minutes until prayer time, and message tone. Optionally include preparation suggestions, inspirational text, user name, and spiritual tradition for personalization.
